subject: Zero Energy Built in Homes  in 7 to 14 Days!
body:
WHY PURCHASE SOMEONE ELSE'S HOME?
When you can build *your* own for less!

IMAGINE... You Can...
* Build a Healthy Ecologically Friendly Home
   in Just  in 7 to 14 days
* Build New for less than buying used.
* Zero energy home- Eliminate utility bills.
* Will NOT BURN!
* Hurricane and Earthquake proof.
* No Termites.
* No Mold.
* No Allergies.
* 100% Finance available.

YOU DESERVE To Live in a Healthy
Ecologically Friendly Home!

For more information Visit us NOW!
www.vibranthome.net
